title: Upgraded Pixel 3a to Android 11, screen unlock issues
content:
After the update to Android 11 , my phone does this weird flickering when unlocking the phone. What could cause this?
Here's the video: https://streamable.com/odpigp?fbclid=IwAR3r2TwD67GEqdwuX-xNmIMa_wmF34qB0EH2h299JsfStwOitHnncerC5FM
